answers: I don't really have those feelings. I'm a pretty confident guy, and I know that I try my best, so I don't have any reason to feel like a failure.

questions: Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed? Or the opposite – being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual?
answers: I've been able to focus on my work and enjoy my hobbies. I haven't had any trouble reading or watching TV, so I think I'm doing alright in that regard.

questions: Over the last two weeks, how often have you been bothered by having thoughts that you would be better off dead or of hurting yourself in some way?
answers: No, definitely not something I've been dealing with. I have a lot of things to be grateful for, and I know that life is precious. So, overall, I've been feeling pretty good lately!
